title: Salted chocolate-hazelnut caramel truffles
ingredients: ['250g chocolate-hazelnut spread', '60g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons water', '160ml whipping cream', '1/4 teaspoon coarse sea salt', '45g cocoa powder', '350g dark chocolate chips (at least 60% cocoa solids), finely chopped', '1 tablespoon coarse sea salt, or to taste']
